title: Spicy Loaded Miso Bowl
summary: Spicy Loaded Miso Bowl is a vegan recipe with 4 servings. For $4.18 per serving, this recipe covers 24% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 159 calories, 8g of protein, and 6g of fat. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 15 minutes. 6 people found this recipe to be tasty and satisfying. A mixture of baby bok choy, snow peas, scallions, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 76%. This score is pretty good. Try Loaded Miso Soup, Loaded Vegetarian Burrito Bowl, and Miso Vegetable Noodle Bowl for similar recipes.
